name: Ant-gravity: Tiny's Adventure
description: Combine your 4-direction gravity manipulation ability with your platformer skills to overcome the challenges of this 2D side-scroller game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2.0GHz CPU with SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7-64Bit Processor: 3.0GHz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 capable GPU DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
